title: feat: add BYOP and API Key Usage Grafana dashboards
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Mapping the pollen paths
gist.blurb: We've added new visualization tools to track how API keys and the new BYOP feature are being used. Data is beautiful!
gist.summary: Deployed new Grafana dashboards to monitor 'Bring Your Own Pollen' adoption and API key usage statistics.
gist.impact: Enhances visibility into platform usage patterns and token economics for the team.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot in a cozy, retro server room or control center, looking at glowing screens displaying pixelated charts and graphs (representing the new dashboards). The vibe is 'mission control' but cute and low-stakes.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot in a retro control room, studying glowing monitors with pixelated line graphs and charts. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text on screen: 'DATA'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee analyzing a glowing monitor with pixelated charts and graphs. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi office vibes. Text in pixel font: 'METRICS'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
